CustomField.formula: if(LEN(Customer_Contact__r.MailingStreet)>0, Customer_Contact__r.MailingStreet& " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(Customer_Contact__r.MailingCity)>0, Customer_Contact__r.MailingCity& ", " , "" )& if(LEN(Customer_Contact__r.MailingState)>0, Customer_Contact__r.MailingState& " " , "" )& if(LEN(Customer_Contact__r.MailingPostalCode)>0, Customer_Contact__r.MailingPostalCode,"") & BR() & If(LEN( Customer_Contact__r.MailingCountry) >0, Customer_Contact__r.MailingCountry,"")
CustomField.label: Customer Addres
